lines.text: So... hm. What happens if you freeze a fire with <c=#0000FF>Mass Arrest Momentum,</c> anyway?
I mean, fire... does it have, like, weight? Speed? How does that even work? Would the spell make it go out of control?
Opal, give us a hand, here. You're a science lady, right?
Um... yes? I don't kn-know anything about magic, though...
What would happen if you just... sort of, magically stopped the stuff it's burning from moving?
I... can't say. But... I doubt it would make the fire... burn out of control.
